<ul id="demo_menu2" >
            <li><sb-a rel="http://dict.youdao.com/search?q=" id='dict_1' onclick='Getconfig(1)'>有道字典</sb-a></li>
            <li><sb-a rel="http://www.iciba.com/" id='dict_2' >icb</sb-a></li>
        </ul>
<script type="text/javascript">
        $("ul#demo_menu2").sidebar({
            position:"right",
            callback:{
                item : {
                    enter : function(){
                        $(this).find("sb-a").animate({color:"red"}, 250);
                    },
                    leave : function(){
                        $(this).find("sb-a").animate({color:"white"}, 250);
                    }
                }
            }
        });
        </script>
